overview:
Michael Schneider is an attorney in the Seattle office of Wilson Sonsini Goodrich & Rosati. Michael’s practice focuses primarily on technology-related transactions and Internet and intellectual property-related issues.

Michael counsels clients in a variety of rapidly developing areas of the law, including DMCA safe harbor compliance, user-generated content issues, widget development and licensing, management of online communities, targeted advertising, and open-source licensing. Michael also works with clients to develop defensive and offensive intellectual property strategies, including assessing the value and timing of seeking trademark, copyright, patent, and trade secret protection.

Outside of his law practice, Michael edits a technology and legal blog at www.thisistech.com, and is a developer of iPhone applications.

degrees.subject: Intellectual Property
degrees.institution: UC Hastings College of the Law
